title: Covid Variant Dangers, Uber Buying Drizly for $1.1B
itunes:title: Covid Variant Dangers, Uber Buying Drizly for $1.1B
description:
Dr. Dave Wessner, Professor of Biology at Davidson College, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Energy Reporter Robert Tuttle talk about the story “Biden’s Keystone XL Cutoff Shocks Town Where Population Doubled.” Bloomberg News Venture Capital Reporter Lizette Chapman shares her insight on Uber buying alcohol delivery startup Drizly for $1.1 billion. And we Drive to the Close with John Traynor, CIO at People's United Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
